title: Carmen
brief_description: Glyndebourne provides the backdrop for Bizet’s “Carmen”. This new Peter Hall production is a torrid drama of passion, blood and squalor, with sets that capture the earthy warmth of Spain. Maria Ewing sings the title role. Rated: G
